titre: Why Men Don't Listen and Women Can't Read Maps
resume: The successful lawyer and ladies' man Jan  observes through a window of his apartment, how a car scrapes his red convertible. The driver is the equally successful publishing assistant Katrin . Despite initial mutual accusations, the two soon become a couple. Then the pregnant couple Rüdiger  and Melanie are introduced. Subsequently different hypotheses explaining the behavior of men and women are offered.
